duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage existing projects and contribute to expanding the portfolio of projects while growing and developing a team to support these efforts.
Proactively challenge construction and operational input and assumptions.
Conduct market intelligence and research when moving into new markets and areas in the US.
Coordination and management of utility-scale wind and renewable hybrid development tasks and services.
Lead or participate in technical and commercial due diligence of utility-scale wind projects.
Assist or lead teams responsible for detailed design and layouts of utility-scale wind projects.
Support land acquisition and entitlement for assigned projects.
Support technology assessment and market intelligence with respect to energy solutions to be incorporated in project designs and bids.
Fully understand financial drivers of all projects assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a business or technical discipline or equivalent experience in a related field. (Master's preferred)
